heading: Private Domain Traffic
Proactively own and nurture your customers

items.title: Build selling website/app
items.subTitle: A place where customers return to buy directly from you!
contents: Support selling in multi-language, multi-currency, and international payments.

items.title: Create motivation to get data (Activate customers)
items.subTitle: Turn walk-in buyers on e-commerce platforms into your own customer base.
contents: Offer vouchers or discount codes: Customers leave their phone number/email to receive exclusive codes.
Mini-games, surveys, lucky spins: Enter information to participate or win prizes.
Member-only offers: Customers receive benefits when they create an account or install the app.

items.title: Automation engagement - Automated nurture and care
items.subTitle: Build long-term relationships with customers without consuming excessive resources and costs
contents: Automatically send SMS, Zalo, email, etc., based on predefined scenarios.
Set up nurturing funnels such as onboarding, remarketing, upselling, etc.
Flexibly segment customers based on engagement level, purchase frequency, repeat visits, etc., to personalize content.
